title: DVDFab.9.1.1.5-Final-Repack.rar
description:
Changes in version 9.1.1.5:

New: Removed some options from Common Settings, since they will be remembered in main interface when user change them.
Fix: Improved user experience of DVD Split.
Fix: A problem that cannot set the subtitle and chapter in Merge mode of DVD Copy.
Fix: A problem that no subtitle ripped when ripping with VOB.Passthrough profile.
Fix: A freeze problem when ripping to. MKV profiles with "Display the forced subtitle only" enabled.
Fix: A problem that FPS (frames per second) is analyzed wrongly, when reading. VOB and. Mpeg files.
Fix: A problem that the resolution is wrong when converting. VOB files in certain cases.

This is a new cracked version delivered for testing purpose...

The approach is somewhat different :

more details :

Setup is in Russian language only but stay easy to install anyway.
Once you will load dvdfab for the first time, you will be able to change and choose/switch for your prefered language :)


here are the few additional details of this specific version :

1. Does not require registration (patch ChVL).
 
2. all languages will stay available anyway once installation will be done.

3. A few tweaks in the registry: 

- Disable "Welcome Screen" on the first run 
- off Auto-update (check update has been disabled)

4. Picked up by an external configuration file fab_config_1.xml, if one is next to the installer 
(to be automatically copied to.  Users  "username"  AppData  DVDFab9). 
"Quiet" setting with keys / SILENT or / VERYSILENT To avoid possible errors of the program 


File has been checked and seems clean anyway.

This is not the last final version but if all options are truly fully functionnal, then you may enjoy this new one so.

Untested by me 'cause i prefer stay on the last v 9.0.7.2.
All other new versions don't seem very stable for me...

Therefore i cannot really say if it will be completely functionnal or not.
Hopefully anyway...


Any feedback will be welcomed 


GL

enjoy and regards
